Date: Thursday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Progress of Arthur Kovacs
Dear Sir,
Arthur Kovacs has nothing more to prove at A Nacogdoches Oaks!
He has an AVG of .363 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Scouting Director

elsewhere!

Regards,
Tyler George
